hadiths.text: Narrated Abu Huraira:Allah's Messenger (ﷺ) said, "The invocation of anyone of you is granted (by Allah) if he does not show impatience (by saying, "I invoked Allah but my request has not been granted)

chapter.ara-name: باب يُسْتَجَابُ لِلْعَبْدِ مَا لَمْ يَعْجَلْ
chapter.eng-name: Invocation is granted by Allah if impatience is not shown
